attributes.action: The beheaded hostages David Haines and Alan Henning should be awarded posthumous awards as heroes
attributes.additional_details:
David Haines and Alan Henning dedicated their lives to helping suffering Muslims. What they did was heroic. They did not deserve to have such savage treatment.

We should recognise what they did and show defiance to the cowards who brutally ended their lives. We should give both of them posthumous award.
